participant_1.background:

i am a classicly trained chef.
i play bass.
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.
I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
I often snack too much on sweets, even though I know it's not good for my health.
i don t like feeling controlled.
my favorite band is nirvana.
I'm a young adult who doesn't want my parents to know about my deployment.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
Hi there, I'm doing well thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well too. I'm a classically trained chef and I love to play bass guitar.
That sounds really cool! I'm proud of the work I do as a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
That's awesome! I love that you're passionate about your work. I'm looking forward to learning more about you.
Thanks! I'm also interested in learning more about you. Are you a member of any hiking groups?
Yes I am! I love spending time outdoors with my family. We've been able to hike a lot more since joining the group.
That's great! I wish I could spend more time outdoors but my work schedule is really busy.
I understand. I hope you can find some time to get out there soon.
Thanks! I'm sure I will. What's your favorite band?
I love Nirvana! I'm a big fan of their music.
Me too! I love their music and their style.
They're one of my favorite bands of all time.
Mine too! It's great to meet someone who shares my love of music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who gets you.
I agree! I'm glad we met.
